TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Imaging extends System.Object
public ref class Imaging abstract sealed

summary.span: Oferece suporte à interoperação gerenciada para não gerenciada para criar objetos de imagem.

span.span: Provides managed to unmanaged interoperation support for creating image objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Essa classe fornece mecanismos de criação para o bitmap principal classe de geração de imagens [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], .This class provides creation mechanisms for the primary bitmap imaging class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], . Isso inclui métodos que criam um com base em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gdi](~/includes/tlasharptla-gdi-md.md)] objetos e seções de memória.This includes methods that create a based on [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gdi](~/includes/tlasharptla-gdi-md.md)] objects , and memory sections.
